radiographic_examinations.findings: consolidation in the right lower lobe
subtle density in the lower lobe of the left lung
single large pulmonary arteriovenous malformation (AVM) in the left lower lobe with aneurysmal dilation of the venous sac measuring 4 cm
large AVM in the left lower lobe with a single feeding artery measuring 10.6 mm in diameter
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Follow-up angiograms revealed no residual flow in the AVM after the procedure.
